group.label: Computing rules and defaults
group.tooltip: Define the SPM monitoring rules and defaults for comuting your products/test limits

setting.label: Statistics to monitor
setting.tooltip: Specify which statistics you want to monitor with this SPM task

setting.label: Minimum lots
setting.tooltip: Specify the minimum nb. of lots required to compute your SPM limits

setting.label: Minimum wafers/sublots
setting.tooltip: Specify the minimum nb. of wafers/sublots required to compute your SPM limits

setting.label: Compute limits
setting.tooltip: Specify which SPM limits should be computed with regard to multi-site data
setting.displayvalues: On merged sites|Per Site|On both split and merged sites

setting.label: Default computation formula
setting.tooltip: Specify the default formula to be used for your SPM limits comutation

setting.label: N1 (standard)
setting.tooltip: For standard alarm, N factor to be used in the formula for computing SPM limits

setting.label: N2 (critical)
setting.tooltip: For critical alarm, N factor to be used in the formula for computing SPM limits

setting.label: Data cleaning during computation
setting.tooltip: Check this box if you want abnormal data points to be removed/filtered when computing limits

group.label: Activating rules
group.tooltip: Define how your SPM task will be executed

setting.label: Active on file insertion
setting.tooltip: Check this box if you want these SPM rules to be triggered on file insertion

setting.label: Active on trigger file
setting.tooltip: Check this box if you want these SPM rules to be triggered by trigger files

group.label: Expiration management
group.tooltip: Define the expiration management rules for your SPM task

setting.label: Validity (days)
setting.tooltip: Define the validity period in days for your SPM limits (used to compute the expiration date)

setting.label: Expiration warning (days)
setting.tooltip: Specify how many days before the expiration of your SPM limits you want to trigger an expiration event. This expiration event can trigger a warning email and/or a SPM limits auto-recomputation (see below options)

setting.label: Send expiration email
setting.tooltip: Check this box if you want expiration warning emails to be delivered for your SPM task

setting.label: Automatically recompute limits
setting.tooltip: Check this box if you want your SPM limits to be automatically recomputed before expiring

setting.label: Auto-recompute method
setting.tooltip: Specify the method to use when automatically recomputing SPM limits before expiration
setting.displayvalues: Duplicate previous limits|Recompute new limits|Duplicate previous limits if recompute fails

setting.label: Auto-recompute period (days)
setting.tooltip: Specify how many days of data you want to use when automatically recomputing SPM limits before expiration

group.label: Email settings
group.tooltip: Define the email settings for alarm and auto-recompute notification emails.

setting.label: Email from
setting.tooltip: Specify the 'From' email address for alarm/auto-recompute notification emails

setting.label: Email to
setting.tooltip: Specify the 'To' email address(es) for alarm/auto-recompute notification emails (comma separated if multiple emails)

setting.label: Email format
setting.tooltip: Email format: HTML or Plain TEXT
